[https://www.codeproject.com/Articles/75822/Create-a-System-Tray-Application-in-VB-NET](https://www.codeproject.com/Articles/75822/Create-a-System-Tray-Application-in-VB-NET)

Is there a possibility to explain, why it doesnt work there?  
Thanks
